mapper.select: select * from TESTINTRO order by SEQ desc
mapper.insert: insert into TESTINTRO(SUBJECT, COMBO, COMBO_TITLE, CONTENT) values(#{subject}, 'ㅇㅇㅇ', #{combo_title}, #{content})
